title: Blizzard Albany, formerly Vicarious Visions, gets union vote greenlight
description: The National Labor Relations Board ruled that a group of 21 quality assurance testers at Blizzard Albany could vote in a union election.

title: Tensions rise in India over claim that Instagram let ruling party tamper with posts
description: The Wire, a small but gutsy news outlet, is investigating its own reporting amid an explosive dispute with Meta.

title: Buffalo massacre report calls for punishing homicide livestreams
description: Letitia James’s (D) investigation marks one of the most significant efforts by U.S. law enforcement to examine the role of the internet in mass shootings.

title: Microsoft lays off employees in Xbox, wargame simulation divisions
description: Tech companies are tightening their belts in response to economic headwinds.
